title: Is there anyone that the new cleaver is NOT an upgrade for?
body:
Riven gets 10% CDR and more MS, Garen gains 10% CDR and MS that might as well negate his spins self slow.  Renekton can finally build an AD/HP item first back and gets 10% more CDR as well as the MS.

I get that the flat armor pen loss was big, but looking at what Riot gave them, I doubt it's going to be a major problem.

(Yes, I know he's only slowed through minions)
